name: station echo
description:
station echo

navigate a labyrinthine transit station, with only your memory to guide you. 
10 rooms in total, with 1 ending.


controls
  • walk around and proceed with WASD or arrow keys
  • look around with mouse
  • full screen button located in the lower right corner

colophon

created using bitsy 3D by aloelazoe
soundtrack: low tide moon and change ringing by louie zong
made for the public transport bitsy jam 🚂
